title: Onboarding
description: Set up your profile and get started with your UniMe app.
creator: UniMe

goals.label: Get your email address verified
goals.description: We can send you a verification link to your provided email address. When you confirm the link in the email, we will issue a credential that proves you own that email address.

faqs.title: What can I do with my email?
Why should I add my email?

goals.label: Log in in to a website
